ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Math 822 introduces some of the connections between topology and group theory. The first half of the course focuses more on topology and extensions, while the second have dives into hyperbolic geometry. The pace of the course is good, and Sam is an excellent lecturer who makes the material interesting and approachable. I would definitely recommend this course to another student.
Would recommend to anyone interested in geometry.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course did a great job of introducing the connection between topology and group theory. Sam was engaging and makes me want to learn more about it.
I gained a more solid basis for my understanding of geometric group theory. I'm sure this will be useful in the future.
